column1: * 1920 – J.R.R. Tolkien is appointed to wikipedia:Reader (academic rank) in English Language at the Leeds University.
* 1938 – J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to A.F. Colborn (21 July 1938).
* 1998 – The Royal Mail published a new set of stamps
column2: "Magical Worlds: Classic Fantasy Books for Children" with art by Peter Malone. One of the stamps features Bilbo Baggins and Smaug.

column1: * 2011 – Light Beyond All Shadow is published.
* 2017 - J.R.R. Tolkien: Romanticist and Poet is published.
